label: 後七日御修法由緒作法
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ごしちにちみしほゆいしょさほう
説明文: Although attributed to Kangen (921), this short work, which explains the origins and ritual sequence of the Latter Seven-Day Rite, was probably compiled by a monk in the 12th c. At the same time, it is possible that Kangen wrote part of the work.
